attributes.action: A FULL enquiry into Governing Body - The McAuley Catholic High School & Children's Services Doncaster Council
attributes.additional_details:
Following the "Forcing out" of The Headteacher by the Governing Body, The Resignation of a Local Authority Governor and the Removal of a Foundation Governor, we request a FULL Public enquiry into the actions of the School and the lack of action by the Local Authority.
Another Failure by Doncaster Council to act to protect our young people.
